dailyretrieve.comment: an array of API calls to be made daily

dailyretrieve._config_summary.comment: A brief description of this item for nodeyez-config app
dailyretrieve.enabled.comment: Indicates whether this entry is enabled. If set to false, it will be skipped
dailyretrieve.headers.comment: Headers to be included in the request.
dailyretrieve.saveToSubfolder.comment: subfolder in the data directory under collectapi to store results
